comment: I took professor Whiting fall 2020 and the class is pretty straightforward and simple. She is very sweet and easy to get in contact with. There are just mostly book readings and papers to follow. No tests. Great easy A!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: She's great. One of the few teachers that understand life happens outside of school. Easy A as long as you do your work. Quizzes are open book so make sure you have one.
